channel.title: CVE Feed for Ivanti -- Velocity License Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ivanti -- Velocity License Server

item.title: CVE-2024-9167|2024-10-08T18:53:57.430Z -- ivanti -- velocity%20license%20server
item.description: Under specific circumstances, insecure permissions in Ivanti Velocity License Server before version 5.2 allows a local authenticated attacker to achieve local privilege escalation.
